HeroSection.heading: Conecting people in need with people who can help
HeroSection.subheading: We connect you with local volunteers and help organizations when you need it most.
description: Our map houses a growing list of aid organizations and pandemic care projects.
Use the map to find and join mutual aid efforts near you or create your own.
If you are an aid organization, add your information to the map so others can find you.

items.title: One-Stop Shop
items.description: Don’t waste hours searching. Get help fast with our database of volunteers.

items.title: Easily Available
items.description: Use our app on the go from any mobile device, tablet, or desktop.

items.title: Completely Free
items.description: No subscriptions or hidden fees. You can browse and post for free.

items.title: Request Help
items.description: Let us know what you need and we'll send your request to local volunteers and organizations.

items.title: Choose Volunteer Offer
items.description: Pick an offer of help from volunteers in your area.

items.title: Coordinate Getting Help
items.description: A volunteer will reach out to you to schedule delivery of your requested items.

items.title: Offer Help
items.description: Let us know what you can help with, and we'll connect you to someone who needs it.

items.title: Choose Who to Help
items.description: Select one or more people in need whose requests you can fulfill.

items.title: Coordinate Helping
items.description: Reach out and coordinate a pickup or delivery of the requested items.

MissionPage.heading: Our Mission
description: We're a nonprofit unifying access to volunteer help worldwide. Through technology, we’re providing quick and easy access to help and resources in your area with local organizations like AIESEC in Portugal, the House of Good Deeds in NYC and more.

With over 300 volunteers in 25 countries and 6 continents, we're connecting communities in need to food banks, charity events, and day-to-day services worldwide. Together, we're building a network of help to keep us stronger and more connected through COVID-19 and beyond.

PartnersSection.heading: Partners
PartnersSection.subheading: We want to thank all our partners. Our mission wouldn't have been the same without them!

TeamPage.heading: Team
description: Hailing from LA to Morocco to Portugal to Bangladesh, we’re an international collective of volunteers from all walks of life, united to ensure that everyone, everywhere can Reach4Help.
We’re looking for volunteer ReactJS developers, marketing/PR strategists and UI/UX designers to help ramp up our efforts fighting the US West Coast wildfires and the incoming second wave of COVID-19.
